companyName: The Attorneys For Freedom Law Firm - Honolulu, HI

description:
The Attorneys for Freedom Law Firm has an office in Honolulu, Hawaii, from which we deliver highly effective counsel and support to clients across the state who have serious and complex legal challenges involving any of the following:
  • Criminal defense for all types of felonies and misdemeanors
  • DUI defense
  • Personal injury and wrongful death claims
  • Motor vehicle accidents, product and premises liability, and other acts of negligence or wrongdoing
  • Civil rights violations and general civil litigation

When you work with our law firm, you will receive the benefit of working directly with an experienced, dedicated legal advocate who has your best interests at heart. No matter how serious your situation, you can rely on us to fight hard to protect your rights and liberties, and we have achieved a long record of securing successful results for our clients both inside and outside of the courtroom.

This success is the direct result of our unwavering commitment to excellence, and you can trust us to do all we can to improve the likelihood that you will achieve the most favorable outcome for your unique situation. In recognition of our outstanding professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned Top One Percent rankings from the National Association of Distinguished Counsel as well as Lawyers of Distinction designations. We have also received Superb client ratings on Avvo as well as top client reviews on Yelp.

To begin the process of retaining the best possible counsel for your legal matter, you can contact The Attorneys for Freedom Law Firm and take advantage of our free initial consultation. During these uncertain times, we also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe.
